description: Rare duplex-type opportunity! This corner 3 Bedroom, 2.5 bath home at Provenance by Polygon offers bright, open living space, with a central kitchen, 9 ft ceiling, and laminate flooring all throughout. It has 2-car side-by-side garage, convenient main powder room, and deluxe bathroom ensuite with double sink. Steps away from the 1 acre park and Provenance Club, a 7000 sqft clubhouse with resort-style amenities. Contact us for viewing. Measurement taken by Listing Realtor. Please verify.
